description: Footage of Tina Turner's amazing three-night stint at the Amsterdam Arena in September, 1996, where she performed all her biggest hits in a spectacular visual production.
name: Tina Turner: Live in Amsterdam

review.name: Something Beautiful Remains!
review.reviewBody: I grew up with Tina Turner's music and videos in the 1980s. I had no idea of her life before MTV. This concert is quite a spectacular all around. Her voice still soars like an angel. If you couldn't make the concert in Amsterdam, Holland, this DVD is the next best thing. Pay attention and watch the credits, she performs a finale song to the audience. The cast and the crew did a terrific job. Tina Turner is an American original icon, musical legend and performer. She can sing soulful like "Something Beautiful Remains" and "On Silent Wings," or she can rise with "The Best" and other of her classics. As Tina got older, she got better and stronger as a performer.
